title: A Zither Jam
description: Judge John Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse Thorn are in chambers this week with a special guest, Tre'vell Anderson of the smash hit Maximum Fun podcast FANTI! They are clearing the docket and talk about picking restaurants, playing music at work, using recyclables as dishware, and responses from listeners about the judge's recent ruling on Santa presents!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn, Tre'vell Anderson, John Hodgman)
